iterationFilesSection.iterationFiles:
**Functional Purpose**: Section header for iteration files synchronization options
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connected section → Iteration files section header
**When Users See This**: When configuring GitHub Syncer settings
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Iteration files"
iterationFilesSection.whenSyncing:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text for the iteration files synchronization options
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connected section → Iteration files section
**When Users See This**: When configuring GitHub Syncer settings, below the 'Iteration files' header
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "When syncing, do you want all the files in the exercise (e.g. your solution, the tests, the README, the hints, etc) to be synced to GitHub, or only your solution file(s)?"
iterationFilesSection.theFullExercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to select syncing of all exercise files
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connected section → Iteration files section
**When Users See This**: When choosing which files to sync to GitHub
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "The full exercise"
iterationFilesSection.onlyMySolutionFile:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to select syncing of only solution files
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connected section → Iteration files section
**When Users See This**: When choosing which files to sync to GitHub
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Only my solution file(s)"
iterationFilesSection.saveChanges:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to save changes made to the iteration files synchronization settings
**UI Location**: GitHub Syncer settings → Connected section → Iteration files section
**When Users See This**: After making changes to the synchronization options and before leaving the section
**Technical Context**: Button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Save changes"
